languages.text: {n}Капеллан снова пристально глядит на вас.{/n} "Хочется верить, что он выбрал вас в наследни{mf|ки|цы} не просто так, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио. Вам, как минимум, хватило смелости прийти сюда, в вертеп людей, которые вас ненавидят за то, что деньги и имущество Денза проплыли мимо них. Дерзость я уважаю — он тоже уважал".

{n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан снова пристально глядит на вас.{/n} "Хочется верить, что он выбрал вас в наследни{mf|ки|цы} не просто так, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио. Вам, как минимум, хватило смелости прийти сюда, в вертеп людей, которые вас ненавидят за то, что деньги и имущество Денза проплыли мимо них. Дерзость я уважаю — он тоже уважал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain peers into you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio. At very least you had the guts to come here, into the nest of vipers who hate you for the fact that Denz's money and property have passed them by. I respect audacity — and so did he."

{n}Chaplain peers into you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio. At very least you had the guts to come here, into the nest of vipers who hate you for the fact that Denz's money and property have passed them by. I respect audacity — and so did he."

{n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."

{n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."

{n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."

languages.text: {n}牧师再次注视着你。{/n}“我愿意相信，他选择你作为他的继承人，并不是一时心血来潮，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}。至少你有勇气来到这里，来到这毒蛇的巢穴中。那群毒蛇都憎恨着你，因为你夺走了他们手中的金钱与财产。我尊重你的勇气，他想必也一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师再次注视着你。{/n}“我愿意相信，他选择你作为他的继承人，并不是一时心血来潮，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}。至少你有勇气来到这里，来到这毒蛇的巢穴中。那群毒蛇都憎恨着你，因为你夺走了他们手中的金钱与财产。我尊重你的勇气，他想必也一样。”

languages.text: {n}Capellán vuelve a mirarte con atención.{/n} «Me gustaría creer que no {mf|le|la} eligió como hereder{mf|o|a} al azar, maestr{mf|o|a} Fidelio. Al menos ha tenido el valor de venir aquí, a un nido de víboras que le detestan porque el dinero y las posesiones de Denz se han escapado entre sus dedos. Respeto esa osadía... al igual que él».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."

traits.locale_text: {n}Capellán vuelve a mirarte con atención.{/n} «Me gustaría creer que no {mf|le|la} eligió como hereder{mf|o|a} al azar, maestr{mf|o|a} Fidelio. Al menos ha tenido el valor de venir aquí, a un nido de víboras que le detestan porque el dinero y las posesiones de Denz se han escapado entre sus dedos. Respeto esa osadía... al igual que él».

languages.text: {n}教戒官はもう一度こちらを伺った。{/n}「ただの気まぐれであなたを選んだわけではないと信じたいです、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ。少なくとも、あなたはデンツの金と土地をこの隙にかすめ取ろうとする毒蛇どもが巣食う場に堂々と姿を見せる根性があります。私はそのような大胆さは嫌いではありませんし、デンツも同じくそう思うでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官はもう一度こちらを伺った。{/n}「ただの気まぐれであなたを選んだわけではないと信じたいです、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ。少なくとも、あなたはデンツの金と土地をこの隙にかすめ取ろうとする毒蛇どもが巣食う場に堂々と姿を見せる根性があります。私はそのような大胆さは嫌いではありませんし、デンツも同じくそう思うでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester fixiert dich ein weiteres Mal.{/n} "Ich würde gerne glauben, dass seine Entscheidung für Euch als {mf|Erben|Erbin} keine Laune war, {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio. Zumindest hattet Ihr den Mut, in dieses Vipernnest zu kommen, die Euch verachten, weil ihnen Denz' Geld und Besitztümer entgangen sind. Ich respektiere derlei Kühnheit – genau wie er."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester fixiert dich ein weiteres Mal.{/n} "Ich würde gerne glauben, dass seine Entscheidung für Euch als {mf|Erben|Erbin} keine Laune war, {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio. Zumindest hattet Ihr den Mut, in dieses Vipernnest zu kommen, die Euch verachten, weil ihnen Denz' Geld und Besitztümer entgangen sind. Ich respektiere derlei Kühnheit – genau wie er."

languages.text: {n}Chapelain vous jette de nouveau un regard scrutateur.{/n} « J'aime à croire qu'il ne vous a pas {mf|désigné|désignée} comme {mf|héritier|héritière} sur un coup de tête, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio. Vous avez eu le courage de venir ici, autrement dit de vous jeter tout droit dans un nid de vipères qui ne chercheront qu'à vous cracher leur venin pour avoir osé leur subtiliser la fortune et les propriétés de Denz. Je respecte ce genre d'audace, de la même manière que Denz la respectait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain vous jette de nouveau un regard scrutateur.{/n} « J'aime à croire qu'il ne vous a pas {mf|désigné|désignée} comme {mf|héritier|héritière} sur un coup de tête, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio. Vous avez eu le courage de venir ici, autrement dit de vous jeter tout droit dans un nid de vipères qui ne chercheront qu'à vous cracher leur venin pour avoir osé leur subtiliser la fortune et les propriétés de Denz. Je respecte ce genre d'audace, de la même manière que Denz la respectait. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz seni bir kez daha süzüyor.{/n} "Denz'in sizi vârisi olarak öylesine seçmediğine inanmak istiyorum Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım}. En azından buraya, Denz'in malı mülkü avuçlarından kayıp gittiği için sizden nefret eden bu yılanların deliğine gelecek yüreği bulmuşsunuz. Ben bu cesarete şapka çıkarırım, belli ki Denz de öyle yapmış."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain peers at you once more.{/n} "I'd like to believe that he didn't choose you as his heir on a whim, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. At least you had the guts to come here, into a nest of vipers who despise you because Denz's money and property slipped through their fingers. I respect that kind of audacity — and so did he."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz bir kez daha sana bakıyor.{/n} "Denz'in sizi vârisi olarak seçerken etraflıca düşündüğüne inanıyorum {mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi} Fidelio. En azından buraya, Denz'in parası ve varlıkları avuçlarından kayıp gittiği için sizden nefret eden bu yılanların deliğine gelecek cesareti bulmuşsunuz. Ben bu cesarete şapka çıkarırım, Denz de öyle yapmış."
